biography: Lauri, a familiar name at Jyväs-Golf, is known for his thoughtful approach to the game. With a singular past appearance at the Hector Trophée, Lauri has always brought a level of strategic depth to the course that is admired by his peers.
While Lauri has not yet claimed either the Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy, his presence has certainly been felt at the event.

Currently considered retired from the Hector Trophée, it remains to be seen whether Lauri will make a return to the competition in the future. His fans will certainly be watching with anticipation, hoping to see him grace the greens once more.
